"WorktablesPerSec","Perf_Optimization",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,];
let machineCSV = ("{Server}");
let machineData = print machineCSV
| project machineArray = parse_csv(machineCSV)
| mv-expand machineId = machineArray
| project machineId = replace_string(tostring(machineId), "'", "")
| parse machineId with * 'machines/' Server
| where Server like "{ServerSearch}"
| join kind = inner (
    SqlAssessment_CL
    | extend
        machineId = tolower(_ResourceId),
        asmt = parse_csv(RawData),
        AsmtDate = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')
    | extend
        AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
        SqlInstance = tostring(asmt[7])
    | where asmt[6] == "1"
    | distinct machineId, SqlInstance, AsmtDate, AsmtId
) on machineId
| project machineId, SqlInstance, AsmtDate, AsmtId;
let machineAsmtInfo = machineData
| join kind = inner (
    machineData
    | summarize AsmtDate = max(AsmtDate) by machineId, SqlInstance
) on machineId, SqlInstance, AsmtDate
| project machineId, SqlInstance, AsmtDate, AsmtId;
let machineSummary = SqlAssessment_CL
| extend
    machineId = tolower(_ResourceId),
    asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| parse tostring(asmt[7]) with * ':' Database
| extend
    AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
    CheckId=tostring(asmt[2]),
    SqlInstance = substring(tostring(asmt[7]), 0, indexof(tostring(asmt[7]), ":")),
    Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed"),
    SeverityCode = toint(asmt[8]),
    Message=tostring(asmt[9])
| where Severity != "Passed"
| join kind = inner (
    machineAsmtInfo
) on machineId, SqlInstance, AsmtId
| distinct machineId, SqlInstance, Database, CheckId, SeverityCode, Severity, Message;
machineSummary
| summarize FailedServers = count_distinct(machineId), Issues = count() by SeverityCode, Severity, Alert = CheckId
| join kind = inner Rules on $left.Alert == $right.ID
| project Alert, SeverityCode, Severity, AlertCategory = Category, FailedServers, Issues, HelpLink = CategoryhelpLink
| order by SeverityCode desc, Alert asc
content.title: Alerts

content.query:
let Rules = datatable(
    ID: string,
    Category: string,
    CategoryDescription: string,
    CategoryDetails: string,
    CategoryhelpLink: string
)

let machineCSV = ("{Server}");
let machineData = print machineCSV
| project machineArray = parse_csv(machineCSV)
| mv-expand machineId = machineArray
| project machineId = replace_string(tostring(machineId), "'", "")
| parse machineId with * 'machines/' Server
| where Server like "{ServerSearch}"
| join kind = inner (
    SqlAssessment_CL
    | extend
        machineId = tolower(_ResourceId),
        asmt = parse_csv(RawData),
        AsmtDate = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')
    | extend
        AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
        SqlInstance = tostring(asmt[7])
    | where asmt[6] == "1"
    | distinct machineId, SqlInstance, AsmtDate, AsmtId
) on machineId
| project machineId, SqlInstance, AsmtDate, AsmtId;
let machineAsmtInfo = machineData
| join kind = inner (
    machineData
    | summarize AsmtDate = max(AsmtDate) by machineId, SqlInstance
) on machineId, SqlInstance, AsmtDate
| project machineId, SqlInstance, AsmtDate, AsmtId;
let machineSummary = SqlAssessment_CL
| extend
    machineId = tolower(_ResourceId),
    asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| parse tostring(asmt[7]) with * ':' Database
| extend
    AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
    CheckId=tostring(asmt[2]),
    SqlInstance = substring(tostring(asmt[7]), 0, indexof(tostring(asmt[7]), ":")),
    Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed"),
    Message=tostring(asmt[9])
| where Severity != "Passed"
| where "{SevAlertsGen}" == "All" or CheckId == "{SevAlertsGen}"
| join kind = inner (
    machineAsmtInfo
) on machineId, SqlInstance, AsmtId
| join kind = inner Rules on $left.CheckId == $right.ID
| distinct machineId, SqlInstance, Database, CheckId, Severity, Message;
let highSevSummary = machineSummary
| where Severity == "High"
| summarize HighSevAlerts = count_distinct(CheckId), HighSevIssues = count() by machineId, SqlInstance;
machineSummary
| summarize DatabasesAssessed = count_distinct(Database), Alerts = count_distinct(CheckId), Issues = count() by machineId, SqlInstance
| join kind = leftouter (
    highSevSummary
) on machineId, SqlInstance
| summarize InstancesAssessed = count(), DatabasesAssessed = sum(DatabasesAssessed) - count(), Alerts = sum(Alerts), HighSevAlerts = sum(HighSevAlerts), Issues = sum(Issues), HighSevIssues = sum(HighSevIssues) by machineId
| order by machineId asc

let sqlCSV = ("{SQLServer}");
let sqlData = print sqlCSV
| project sqlArray = parse_csv(sqlCSV)
| mv-expand sqlId = sqlArray
| project sqlId = replace_string(tostring(sqlId), "'", "")
| where "{machineIdGen}" != "None" 
| parse sqlId with * 'sqlserverinstances/' SQLServer
| parse "{machineIdGen}" with * 'machines/' Server
| where SQLServer startswith Server
| join kind = leftouter (
    SqlAssessment_CL
    | extend
        machineId = tolower(_ResourceId)
    | where machineId == "{machineIdGen}"
    | extend
        asmt = parse_csv(RawData),
        AsmtDate = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')
    | extend
        AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
        SQLServer = replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])), "\\", "_")
    | where asmt[6] == "1"
    | distinct SQLServer, AsmtDate, AsmtId
) on SQLServer
| project sqlId, SQLServer, AsmtDate, AsmtId;
let sqlAsmtInfo = sqlData
| join kind = inner (
    sqlData
    | summarize Assessments = count(), EarliestAssessment = min(AsmtDate), LatestAssessment = max(AsmtDate) by sqlId, SQLServer
) on sqlId, SQLServer, $left.AsmtDate == $right.LatestAssessment
| project sqlId, SQLServer, Assessments, EarliestAssessment, LatestAssessment, AsmtId;
let sqlSummary = SqlAssessment_CL
| extend
    machineId = tolower(_ResourceId)
| where machineId == "{machineIdGen}"
| extend
    asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| parse tolower(tostring(asmt[7])) with * ':' Database
| extend
    AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
    CheckId=tostring(asmt[2]),
    SQLServer = replace_string(replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])), "\\", "_"), strcat(":", Database), ""),
    Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed"),
    Message=tostring(asmt[9])
| where Severity != "Passed"
| where "{SevAlertsGen}" == "All" or CheckId == "{SevAlertsGen}"
| join kind = rightouter (
    sqlAsmtInfo
) on SQLServer, AsmtId
| join kind = leftouter Rules on $left.CheckId == $right.ID
| where CheckId == "" or ID != ""
| distinct sqlId, SQLServer, Database, CheckId, Severity, Message;
let highSevSummary = sqlSummary
| where Severity == "High"
| summarize HighSevAlerts = count_distinct(CheckId), HighSevIssues = count() by sqlId, SQLServer;
sqlSummary
| summarize DatabasesAssessed = count_distinct(Database), Alerts = count_distinct(CheckId), Issues = count() by sqlId, SQLServer
| join kind = leftouter (
    highSevSummary
) on SQLServer
| join kind = leftouter (
    sqlAsmtInfo
) on sqlId, SQLServer
| project
    sqlId
    , SQLServer
    , Assessments = case(isnull(Assessments), 0, Assessments)
    , EarliestAssessment
    , LatestAssessment
    , DatabasesAssessed = DatabasesAssessed - 1
    , Alerts = case(isnull(Assessments), 0, Alerts)
    , HighSevAlerts = case(isnull(HighSevAlerts), 0, HighSevAlerts)
    , Issues = case(isnull(Assessments), 0, Issues)
    , HighSevIssues = case(isnull(HighSevIssues), 0, HighSevIssues)
| order by sqlId asc
content.title: ARC Enabled SQL Server Instances

parameters.name: AssessmentDateGen
parameters.label: Assessment Date
parameters.query:
SqlAssessment_CL
| where tolower(_ResourceId) == "{machineIdGen}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where asmt[6] =~ "1"
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") == "{sqlNameGen}"
| project upload_id = tostring(asmt[1]),format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm')
| summarize TimeGenerated = min(TimeGenerated) by upload_id
| order by TimeGenerated

    ID: string,
    Category: string,
    CategoryDescription: string,
    CategoryDetails: string,
    CategoryhelpLink: string
)

SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineIdGen}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlNameGen}"
| where tostring(asmt[1]) == "{AssessmentDateGen}"
| extend CheckId=tostring(asmt[2])
| project CheckId
| join kind = inner Rules on $left.CheckId == $right.ID
| distinct Category
| order by Category asc

parameters.name: TargetGen
parameters.label: Target
parameters.query:
SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineIdGen}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlNameGen}"
| where tostring(asmt[1]) == "{AssessmentDateGen}"
| extend Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed")
| extend Target=tostring(asmt[7])
| distinct TargetSearch = replace_string(replace_string(Target, "\\", "_"), ":", ""), Target
| order by Target asc

parameters.name: SeverityGen
parameters.label: Severity
parameters.query:
SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineIdGen}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlNameGen}"
| where tostring(asmt[1]) == "{AssessmentDateGen}"
| extend Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed")
| extend SeverityCode = toint(asmt[8])
| distinct Severity, SeverityCode
| order by SeverityCode
| project-away SeverityCode

parameters.name: AlertGen
parameters.label: Alert
parameters.query:
SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineIdGen}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlNameGen}"
| where tostring(asmt[1]) == "{AssessmentDateGen}"
| extend Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed")
| extend CheckId=tostring(asmt[2])
| distinct CheckId
| order by CheckId asc

let allAlerts = SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineIdGen}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlNameGen}"
| extend
    AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
    CheckId=tostring(asmt[2]),
    DisplayString=asmt[3],
    Description=tostring(asmt[4]),
    HelpLink=asmt[5],
    TargetType=case(asmt[6] == 1, "Server", asmt[6] == 2, "Database", ""),
    TargetName=tostring(asmt[7]), 
    Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed"),
    Message=tostring(asmt[9]),
    TagsArr=split(tostring(asmt[10]), ","),
    SeverityCode = toint(asmt[8])
| where AsmtId == "{AssessmentDateGen}"
| where replace_string(replace_string(TargetName, "\\", "_"), ":", "") in ({TargetGen})
| where Severity in ({SeverityGen})
| where CheckId in ({AlertGen})
| join kind = inner Rules on $left.CheckId == $right.ID
| where Category in ({CategoryGen})
| distinct
    TargetType,
    TargetName,
    Severity,
    Message,
    Tags=strcat_array(array_slice(TagsArr, 1, -1), ', '),
    CheckId,
    Category,
    CategoryDescription,
    CategoryhelpLink,
    HelpLink = tostring(HelpLink),
    SeverityCode
| summarize Issues = count() by Severity, SeverityCode, Tags, CheckId, Category;
let failedAlerts = allAlerts
| where Severity != "Passed";
allAlerts
| join kind = leftouter (
    failedAlerts
  ) on CheckId
| where CheckId1 == "" or Severity != "Passed"
| summarize count() by Severity
| render piechart
content.title: Alerts by Severity

content.query:

SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineIdGen}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlNameGen}"
| extend
    AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
    CheckId=tostring(asmt[2]),
    DisplayString=asmt[3],
    Description=tostring(asmt[4]),
    HelpLink=asmt[5],
    TargetType=case(asmt[6] == 1, "Server", asmt[6] == 2, "Database", ""),
    TargetName=tostring(asmt[7]), 
    Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed"),
    Message=tostring(asmt[9]),
    TagsArr=split(tostring(asmt[10]), ","),
    SeverityCode = toint(asmt[8])
| where AsmtId == "{AssessmentDateGen}"
| where Severity != "Passed"
| where replace_string(replace_string(TargetName, "\\", "_"), ":", "") in ({TargetGen})
| where Severity in ({SeverityGen})
| where CheckId in ({AlertGen})
| join kind = inner Rules on $left.CheckId == $right.ID
| where Category in ({CategoryGen})
| distinct
    TargetType,
    TargetName,
    Severity,
    Message,
    Tags=strcat_array(array_slice(TagsArr, 1, -1), ', '),
    CheckId,
    Category,
    CategoryDescription,
    CategoryhelpLink,
    HelpLink = tostring(HelpLink),
    SeverityCode
| summarize Issues = count() by Alert = CheckId, Severity, SeverityCode, AlertCategory = Category, HelpLink = CategoryhelpLink
| project Alert, Severity, SeverityCode, AlertCategory, Issues, HelpLink
| order by SeverityCode, Issues
| project-away SeverityCode

SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineIdGen}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlNameGen}"
| extend
    AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
    CheckId=tostring(asmt[2]),
    DisplayString=asmt[3],
    Description=tostring(asmt[4]),
    HelpLink=asmt[5],
    TargetType=case(asmt[6] == 1, "Server", asmt[6] == 2, "Database", ""),
    TargetName=tostring(asmt[7]), 
    Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed"),
    Message=tostring(asmt[9]),
    TagsArr=split(tostring(asmt[10]), ","),
    SeverityCode = toint(asmt[8])
| where AsmtId == "{AssessmentDateGen}"
| where Severity != "Passed"
| where replace_string(replace_string(TargetName, "\\", "_"), ":", "") in ({TargetGen})
| where Severity in ({SeverityGen})
| where CheckId in ({AlertGen})
| where "{selAlertGen}" == "All" or CheckId == "{selAlertGen}"
| join kind = inner Rules on $left.CheckId == $right.ID
| where Category in ({CategoryGen})
| distinct
    TargetType,
    TargetName,
    Severity,
    Message,
    Tags=strcat_array(array_slice(TagsArr, 1, -1), ', '),
    CheckId,
    Category,
    CategoryDescription,
    CategoryhelpLink,
    HelpLink = tostring(HelpLink),
    SeverityCode
| summarize count() by Category
| render piechart
content.title: Recommendations by Category

    ID: string,
    Category: string,
    CategoryDescription: string,

"SMOAndDMOXPs","Configuration/Standards",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,
"SysAdminDefaultDatabase","Configuration/Standards",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,
"TwoDigitYearCutoff","Configuration/Standards",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,
"UserConnections","Perf_Optimization",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,
"UserOptions","Configuration/Standards",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,
"WaitsForWorker","Perf_Optimization",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,
"WaitsLogWrite","Perf_Optimization",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,
"WaitsNetworkIO","Perf_Optimization",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,
"WaitsNonPageLatch","Perf_Optimization",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,
"WaitsPageIOLatch","Perf_Optimization",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,
"WaitsPageLatch","Perf_Optimization",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,

"WorkingSetSize","Configuration/Standards",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,
"WorktablesFromCache","Perf_Optimization",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,
"WorktablesPerSec","Perf_Optimization",``````,``````,```https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/statistics/statistics#CreateStatistics```,];
SqlAssessment_CL
| where _ResourceId == "{machineIdGen}"
| extend asmt = parse_csv(RawData)
| where replace_string(tolower(tostring(asmt[7])),"\\","_") contains "{sqlNameGen}"
| extend
    AsmtId=tostring(asmt[1]),
    CheckId=tostring(asmt[2]),
    DisplayString=asmt[3],
    Description=tostring(asmt[4]),
    HelpLink=asmt[5],
    TargetType=case(asmt[6] == 1, "Server", asmt[6] == 2, "Database", ""),
    TargetName=tostring(asmt[7]), 
    Severity=case(asmt[8] == 30, "High", asmt[8] == 20, "Medium", asmt[8] == 10, "Low", asmt[8] == 0, "Information", asmt[8] == 1, "Warning", asmt[8] == 2, "Critical", "Passed"),
    Message=tostring(asmt[9]),
    TagsArr=split(tostring(asmt[10]), ","),
    SeverityCode = toint(asmt[8])
| where AsmtId == "{AssessmentDateGen}"
| where Severity != "Passed"
| where replace_string(replace_string(TargetName, "\\", "_"), ":", "") in ({TargetGen})
| where Severity in ({SeverityGen})
| where CheckId in ({AlertGen})
| where "{selAlertGen}" == "All" or CheckId == "{selAlertGen}"
| join kind = inner Rules on $left.CheckId == $right.ID
| where Category in ({CategoryGen})
| distinct
    Target = TargetType,
    Name = TargetName,
    Severity,
    Message,
    Tags=strcat_array(array_slice(TagsArr, 1, -1), ', '),
    Alert = CheckId,
    Description,
    HelpLink = tostring(HelpLink),
    SeverityCode
| order by SeverityCode desc, Target desc, Name asc
| project-away SeverityCode
content.title: Recommendation Details
